analyzed: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te /

translated: That thought of omniscience, which is untainted and not included, is also not attached. Because of that, he is counted as a bodhisattva great being.”🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

original: thos kyi sems med /
analyzed: thos kyi sems med /
translated: Where there is no arising, no cessation, no decrease, no increase, no coming, no going, no defilement, and no purification, there is no thought of a śrāvaka,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sems med /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so //

translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: gzugs kyang chags pa med do //

translated: Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are also not attached to consciousness.”🔽“Venerable Subhūti,🔽is form also not attached to form?

original: khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang /
analyzed: khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang /
translated: the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, the factors of awakening, the powers, the fearlessnesses, the aspects of correct understanding, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are nonexistent,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: and they are also unattached to the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /🔽byang @186a *// chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni / byang @186a *// chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that🔽do not falsely project any phenomena with the mind of awakening, the mind equal to the unequaled, the mind not shared in common with all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: They do not falsely project anything with that mind, and they do not falsely project anything with the method of not apprehending any phenomena.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he is called a bodhisattva mahāsattva.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines,

original: lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter twelve, “Eliminating Views.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so //
analyzed: don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so //
translated: I too have confidence in the matter of what a bodhisattva mahāsattva is.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /
analyzed: gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /
translated: “Pūrṇa, you have confidence.”

original: gang pos gsol pa /
analyzed: gang pos gsol pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags /🔽sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags / sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags /
translated: “Lord, that being is armed with great armor;🔽that being has set out in the Great Vehicle;

original: sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te /
analyzed: sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te /
translated: that being has set out well in the Great Vehicle.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: Blessed One, for that reason he is called a bodhisattva great being.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra:

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: “Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: ji @186b tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya /
analyzed: ji @186b tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya /
translated: to what extent is a bodhisattva great being said to be wearing the great armor?

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: ” Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: here a bodhisattva great being does not practice for awakening for the sake of limited beings.

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi /
translated: He does not stand in the perfection of giving and give gifts.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
translated: He practices the perfection of giving and gives gifts for the sake of all beings.

original: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: For the sake of limited beings, they abide in the perfection of discipline.

original: tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi; sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi; sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //
translated: They do not guard discipline, but for the sake of all beings they practice the perfection of discipline and guard discipline.

original: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te; bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te; bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: For the sake of limited beings, they abide in the perfection of patience and cultivate patience.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa bsgom par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa bsgom par byed do //
translated: They do not cultivate patience for the sake of all beings, but they practice the perfection of patience and cultivate patience.

original: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: For the sake of limited beings, they abide in the perfection of diligence and apply diligence.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not apply diligence,

original: sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: but for the sake of all beings they practice the perfection of diligence and apply diligence.

original: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: For the sake of the limited sentient beings, he abides in the perfection of meditative absorption.

original: bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi /🔽sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol @187a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi / sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol @187a *//
translated: He does not cultivate meditative absorption.

original: tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do //
analyzed: tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, he practices the perfection of meditative absorption and generates the meditative absorptions.

original: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: For the sake of the limited sentient beings, he abides in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: He does not cultivate wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, he practices the perfection of wisdom and cultivates wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni /
translated: The bodhisattva, the great being, thinks:

original: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o //🔽sems can 'di snyed cig ni /
analyzed: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o // sems can 'di snyed cig ni /
translated: I must lead this many sentient beings to complete nirvana in the element of nirvana that is without a remaining substratum.

original: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o //
translated: I must not lead this many sentient beings to complete nirvana.

original: zhe'am / sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o //🔽sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhe'am / sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o // sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o //
translated: I will establish this many sentient beings in enlightenment,🔽but not that many.

original: zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi /
analyzed: zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi /
translated: The bodhisattva does not don the armor by counting sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great being

original: sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no //
translated: does don the armor for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /🔽bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te / bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: He thinks as follows:🔽I must complete the perfection of generosity.

original: sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to the perfection of generosity.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs @187b par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs @187b par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, I too must complete the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all sentient beings to the perfection of wisdom.

original: snyam mo // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: snyam mo // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving do not do so with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
translated: but they give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
translated: He dedicates that wholesome root to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: making it common to all sentient beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: this is the armor of the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: moreover, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
translated: give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni /
translated: not dedicating them to the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of morality of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who gives gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de @188a *//🔽dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de @188a *// dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the acceptance and belief of bodhisattva mahāsattva great beings who give gifts, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, in those dharmas,

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: is the armor of the perfection of patience of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who gives gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the perseverance of bodhisattva mahāsattva great beings who give gifts, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, is the armor of the perfection of perseverance of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who gives gifts.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of generosity

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: are the armor of the perfection of effort in giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽“Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of generosity

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: are the armor of the perfection of concentration in giving gifts.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de /
translated: They make their minds one-pointed with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: and they do not give an opportunity to the thoughts of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of generosity

original: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: are the armor of the perfection of concentration in giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
translated: Moreover, when a bodhisattva great being practices generosity,

original: de gcig bu la dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de gcig bu la dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: because they focus on just that,

original: chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye @188b par gnas shing /🔽de sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye @188b par gnas shing / de sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they are close to the perception that all phenomena are like an illusion.🔽They do not apprehend a giver,

original: sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a gift,

analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: That is the armor of the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of generosity, giving a gift.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom in that way should be known as wearing the great armor.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa med na /

analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni /

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of morality, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, has the perception of what is created by an illusion with regard to all phenomena.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of giving of a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The perfection of morality, perfection of patience, and perfection of perseverance of one practicing the perfection of meditative stabilization are also like that.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of meditative stabilization

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /
translated: cultivating the perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste /
translated: establish the perception of all phenomena as created by an illusion.

original: de'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not done with the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan @191b pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan @191b pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing /
translated: but with the attention that is endowed with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: And that wholesome root is made common to all beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: It is dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
translated: do not dedicate with the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
translated: They give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they give gifts with the three spheres completely purified.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: They make those wholesome roots into something shared in common by all sentient beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: They dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: That is the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, and the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /
translated: and cultivating the perfection of wisdom

original: de @192a *// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de @192a *// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: have the perception of all perfections and all phenomena as like an illusion, a dream, an optical aberration, an echo, a reflected image, and a magical creation.

original: de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not do so with attention associated with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing /
translated: but with attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: They make that wholesome root common to all sentient beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom for a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te /
translated: in that way a bodhisattva great being standing in each perfection

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: completes all six perfections.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: moreover, a bodhisattva great being becomes absorbed in the meditative stabilizations but

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
translated: does not savor the meditative stabilizations,

original: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te /
translated: and they do not carry him away;

original: de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye /
translated: he is not reborn under their influence.

original: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: He becomes absorbed in the immeasurable and formless meditative stabilizations but🔽does not savor them,

original: ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
analyzed: ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
translated: and

original: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs @192b la; de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs @192b la; de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste /
translated: They are not carried away by them, and they are not born under their control.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o //
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings endowed with skill in means.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings see the concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions as empty and dwell in that.🔽They see them as signless and dwell in that.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang /
translated: They see them as wishless and dwell in that.🔽But they do not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de; de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de; de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te /
translated: This is the great armor of the skill in means of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: thus is a bodhisattva mahāsattva said to be wearing the great armor.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na /
translated: the blessed buddhas dwelling in the ten directions also proclaim and praise the bodhisattva mahāsattva who is wearing the great armor in this way:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
translated: ‘In such and such a world system, a bodhisattva mahāsattva wearing the great armor is bringing beings to maturity

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa'ang gsung la /🔽@193a *// ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing /🔽byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra brjod pa'ang mdzad la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa'ang gsung la / @193a *// ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra brjod pa'ang mdzad la /
translated: and purifying a buddhafield.’🔽They also proclaim that bodhisattva’s name🔽and proclaim the sound of that bodhisattva.

original: dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do //
analyzed: dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do //
translated: They also proclaim that bodhisattva’s melody.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: “Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin /
translated: to what extent does a bodhisattva great being set out in the Great Vehicle?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin /
translated: What is the Great Vehicle of a bodhisattva great being?”

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections,

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa /
translated: and when they practice the perfection of giving, they are secluded from desires,

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
translated: secluded from evil nonvirtuous things,

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: and endowed with investigation and analysis.

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /🔽rgya chen por gyur pa /
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa / rgya chen por gyur pa /
translated: He abides in the fourth concentration, which is devoid of pleasure and pain, and is endowed with pure purified equanimity and mindfulness.

original: tshad med pa /🔽mi gnyis pa /🔽khon med pa /🔽'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / mi gnyis pa / khon med pa / 'gran zla med pa /
translated: He abides in the sphere of infinite space, having completely transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' @193b ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' @193b ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa /
translated: He abides in the sphere of infinite consciousness, having completely transcended the sphere of infinite space.

original: tshad med pa /🔽mi gnyis pa /🔽khon med pa /🔽'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / mi gnyis pa / khon med pa / 'gran zla med pa /
translated: He abides in the sphere of nothingness, having completely transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: gnod pa med pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa /
translated: He abides in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, having completely transcended the sphere of nothingness.🔽He abides in the cessation of perception and feeling, having completely transcended the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med /
translated: They are very cultivated, and they pervade the world sphere with the dharma sphere,🔽and they abide pervading the ten directions to the ends of space.

original: 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni /
translated: Similarly, they perfect and abide in the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te /
translated: These are the bodhisattva great beings’ concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of generosity

original: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
translated: When they rise from those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,🔽they dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @194a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @194a *//
translated: making common cause with all sentient beings.🔽“The same should be applied to the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and the perfection of concentration.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: They enter the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing /
translated: “When bodhisattvas abide in those concentrations, those immeasurables, and those formless absorptions,

original: de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na /
analyzed: de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na /
translated: when they enter into and rise up from those concentrations, those immeasurables, and those formless absorptions,

original: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de /
translated: they attend to the aspects, signs, and attributes of space.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas /
translated: they make those and other wholesome roots into something shared in common by all sentient beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
translated: and dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag @194b par zhugs pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag @194b par zhugs pa yin no // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Thus, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings have set out in the Great Vehicle.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with a thought endowed with love,

original: rgya chen por gyur pa; tshad med pa /
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa; tshad med pa /
translated: vast, great, immeasurable,

original: mi gnyis pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa /
translated: nondual,

original: khon med pa /
analyzed: khon med pa /
translated: without enmity,

original: 'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: 'gran zla med pa /
translated: without rivalry,

original: gnod pa med pa /🔽shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa / shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: without harm,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing /
translated: having well cultivated it, abide pervading one direction with a thought of love,🔽and likewise the second, the third, and the fourth directions,🔽the four intermediate directions,🔽and also above and below,🔽all around, everywhere.

original: phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin te /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin te /
translated: It is a bodhisattva great being’s samādhi that pervades each of the ten directions, as far as the realm of phenomena extends, as far as space is found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings’ vast,

original: rgya chen por gyur pa /
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa /
translated: great,

original: tshad med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa /
translated: immeasurable,

original: mi gnyis pa /🔽khon med pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa / khon med pa /
translated: nondual,🔽noncontentious,

original: 'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: 'gran zla med pa /
translated: unrivaled,

original: gnod pa med pa /🔽shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa / shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: harmless,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas par ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas par ni /
translated: and well-cultivated minds endowed with equanimity pervade each of the ten directions, as far as the realm of phenomena extends, as far as space is found.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called a bodhisattva great being’s samādhi.

original: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam @195a *//
analyzed: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam @195a *//
translated: “Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings, with a mind endowed with the knowledge of all aspects, preceded by great compassion, in order to eliminate the afflictions of all sentient beings,🔽speak about, teach, and explain to others the concentrations,

original: gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la'ang brjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la /🔽rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing /
analyzed: gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la'ang brjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la / rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing /
translated: the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions,

original: de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni /
analyzed: de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni /
translated: and when they properly teach the enjoyment of those, their disadvantages, and their definite release,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: that is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of generosity.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing bsgom ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing bsgom ste /
translated: “When, with those very attention endowed with the knowledge of all aspects, they master and cultivate the first concentration and the second concentration up to the fourth concentration,

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la /
translated: He also abides in the first concentration and in the fourth concentration.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽nyan thos kyi sems sam /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / nyan thos kyi sems sam /
translated: And it is like this:🔽he does not open the way for other thoughts,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni /
translated: such as the thought of a śrāvaka or the thought of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great being’s untarnished perfection of morality.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: “The bodhisattva great being who is established in the applications of mindfulness connected with the knowledge of all aspects thinks like this:

original: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
translated: ‘I will teach the Dharma in order to end the defilements of all sentient beings.’

original: snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang @195b yin pa de ni /
analyzed: snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang @195b yin pa de ni /
translated: The desire, patience, discernment, understanding, and close investigation of those applications of mindfulness

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: su bsngo zhing /
translated: “Moreover, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, having made all wholesome roots common to all beings, dedicate them to the knowledge of all aspects

original: brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni /
translated: and do not give up striving.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of perseverance of bodhisattva great beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, enter into and rise up from all the meditative stabilizations, liberations, concentrations, and absorptions,🔽they do not fall to the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing /
translated: the pratyekabuddha level,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: and they dedicate that wholesome root, made common to all beings, to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi @196a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi @196a *//
translated: With attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they discern the aspects of impermanence,

original: pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni /
analyzed: pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni /
translated: suffering, no-self, peace, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness in the branches of the first concentration, the second concentration, the third concentration, and the fourth concentration.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle of the six perfections.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva mahāsattva has correctly entered the Great Vehicle.🔽

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Thus, Venerable Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being is one who has set out in the Great Vehicle.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is the cultivation of the thirty-seven aspects of awakening in all their aspects, and the cultivation of the emptiness,🔽signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation in all their aspects, and the cultivation of the powers,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o //
translated: fearlessnesses, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha in all their aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu; de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu; de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, that is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs @196b pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs @196b pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva has set out in the Great Vehicle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: furthermore, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattva is when the bodhisattva mahāsattva enters into the meditative absorption of loving kindness

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo //
translated: and is intent on thinking, “I will protect all sentient beings.”

original: zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: He enters into the meditative absorption of compassion🔽and is intent on having compassion for sentient beings and on being kind to them.

original: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: He also enters into the meditative absorption of joy

original: bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: and is intent on thinking, “I will liberate all sentient beings.”

original: zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: They are intent on sentient beings and also enter into the meditative absorption of equanimity.

original: sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste /
translated: They are intent on eliminating the defilements of sentient beings.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang /
translated: enter into and rise from the aspects, signs, and indications of the concentrations and immeasurables,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni /
translated: except for the knowledge of all aspects, they do not dedicate them to the śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha levels.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @197a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @197a *//
translated: The perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables is unblemished.

original: chen po gang gi tshe /
analyzed: chen po gang gi tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing /
translated: dwell without mixing with those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: they do not wish for the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am /
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi /
analyzed: sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi /
translated: those two levels.

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing /
translated: They are patient with the knowledge of all aspects🔽and wish for

original: 'dod pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa de ni /
translated: that.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva, through generating the mind endowed with omniscience, does not abandon the unwholesome dharmas and does not perfect the wholesome dharmas, that is the perfection of effort of the bodhisattva mahāsattva practicing the immeasurables.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: enters those meditative concentrations, those immeasurables, and those formless absorptions,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la /
translated: he is not born by the power of the meditative concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
analyzed: de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /
translated: and he does not experience their taste.

original: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That which is not taken away by those is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of concentration practice in the immeasurables.

original: byang chub sems @197b dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la /
analyzed: byang chub sems @197b dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, enter into and rise up from those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: de'ang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang /
analyzed: de'ang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang /
translated: they discern them as having the aspects of impermanence, suffering, no-self, and peace, and as having the aspects of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, but they do not enter into the śrāvaka’s or pratyekabuddha’s

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni /
translated: and he does not enter into the flawlessness of a pratyekabuddha—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom of a bodhisattva great being.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of a bodhisattva great being.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //
translated: Thus a bodhisattva great being mounts the Great Vehicle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: further, the Great Vehicle of a bodhisattva great being is the knowledge of inner emptiness, and the knowledge of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, through the mode of nonapprehending.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang @198a *//🔽dag par zhugs pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang @198a *// dag par zhugs pa yin no // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Thus, Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great beings are correctly engaged in the Great Vehicle.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g-yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g-yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is the knowledge that the mind is not distracted and is in equipoise with regard to all phenomena.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: This, Venerable Śāriputra, is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Thus, Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great beings are correctly engaged in the Great Vehicle.🔽Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is the knowledge that the mind is not distracted and is in equipoise with regard to all phenomena.
