original: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Heroic Progress, the samadhi called Jewel Seal, the samadhi called Lion’s Play, the samadhi called Good Moon,

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Moon Banner Peak, the samadhi called Exalted Above All Dharmas, the samadhi called Looking at the Crown, the samadhi called Ascertained in the Dharmadhatu,

original: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Banner of Certainty, the samadhi called Vajra Jewel, the samadhi called Entering the Seal of All Dharmas, the samadhi called Abiding Like a King in Samadhi,

original: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Radiating Light Rays, the samadhi called Arrayed Army, the samadhi called Exalted, the samadhi called Entering the Teaching of Definitive Words,

original: tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes @224a *//🔽bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes @224a *// bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Entering the True Meaning, the samādhi called Looking in All Directions, the samādhi called Holding the Seal, the samādhi called Nonforgetting,🔽the samādhi called the Seal of the Ocean of the True Gathering of All Dharmas, the samādhi called Filling the Sky, the samādhi called Vajra Center,

original: rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Rejecting Jewels, the samādhi called Illumination, the samādhi called Nonseeking, the samādhi called Not Relying on Abodes,

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Non-mind, the samadhi called Stainless Lamp, the samadhi called Infinite Light, the samadhi called Light-maker, the samadhi called Universal Illumination,

original: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Holy Purity, the samadhi called Stainless Light, the samadhi called Joy-maker, the samadhi called Lightning Lamp,

original: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Inexhaustible, the samadhi called Possessing Brilliance, the samadhi called Free from Exhaustion, the samadhi called Unmoving, the samadhi called Immutable,

original: nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Sun Lamp, the samadhi called Stainless Moon, the samadhi called Pure Light, the samadhi called Light Maker,

original: @224b bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: @224b bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Action Accomplishment, the samadhi called Wisdom Peak, the samadhi called Vajra-like, the samadhi called Mind Abiding, the samadhi called Universal Illumination,🔽the samadhi called Firmly Abiding, the samadhi called Jewel End, the samadhi called Seal of the Sublime Dharma, the samadhi called Equality of All Dharmas,

original: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: and

original: dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samadhi called Abandoning Joy, the samadhi called Noble and Complete through Dharma, the samadhi called Scattering, the samadhi called Distinguishing the Words of All Dharmas,🔽the samadhi called Arranging Syllables Equally, the samadhi called Free from Syllables, the samadhi called Cutting Off Referents, the samadhi called Immutable,

original: rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Without Aspect, the samadhi called Without Abiding, the samadhi called Without Cataracts, the samadhi called Endowed with Conduct,

original: g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

original: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa @225a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa @225a *//
translated: the meditative absorption of the blooming and purity of virtuous flowers,🔽the meditative absorption of the existence of the branches of awakening,🔽the meditative absorption of infinite eloquence,

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

original: chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samadhi called Transcending All Dharmas, the samadhi called Complete Cutting, the samadhi called Dispelling Doubt, the samadhi called Without a Location,🔽the samadhi called Single Array, the samadhi called Manifesting Aspects, the samadhi called Becoming One Aspect, the samadhi called Without Discarding Aspects,

original: rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Free from All the Darkness of Existence through Realization, the samadhi called Entering into Words and Sounds, the samadhi called Free from Syllables of Sound and Melody,

original: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the blazing lamp meditative stabilization, the thorough refinement of characteristics meditative stabilization, the nonapprehending meditative stabilization, the endowed with all supreme aspects meditative stabilization,

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // @225b gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // @225b gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the nondelight in all happiness and suffering meditative stabilization, the inexhaustible casket meditative stabilization, the dhāraṇī intelligence meditative stabilization,

original: yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Eliminating All That is Correct and Incorrect, the samadhi called Pacifying All Conflict and Stopping, the samadhi called No Conflict or Stopping,

original: 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Stainless Light, the samadhi called Endowed with Essence, the samadhi called Stainless Light of the Full Moon, the samadhi called Great Array,

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang /
translated: the samādhi called Illumination in All Aspects, the samādhi called Equality of Samādhis, the samādhi called Gathering of the Absence of Defilements, the samādhi called Absence of Sound,🔽

original: sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Illumination in All Aspects, the samādhi called Equality of Samādhis, the samādhi called Gathering of the Absence of Defilements, the samādhi called Gathering of All Sounds and No Sounds, the samādhi called Effort in the Absence of Abiding in a Place, the samādhi called Abiding in Suchness and No Mind,

original: lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med par rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med par rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: the meditative stabilization called “Eliminating the Faults of the Body,” the meditative stabilization called “Like Space through the Destruction of the Faults of Speech,” and the meditative stabilization called “Unattached, Liberated, and Uncovered Like Space.”

original: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called ‘Heroic Walk’?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams @226a *//🔽su myong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams @226a *// su myong bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization that experiences the domain of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the ‘Heroic Walk’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called ‘Jewel Seal’?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization that seals all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the ‘Jewel Seal’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the siṃhavijṛmbhita meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which he sports with all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni sengge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the siṃhavijṛmbhita meditative stabilization.

original: de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which he illuminates all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the sucandra meditative stabilization.

original: de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste /

analyzed: de ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the candrānana banner-top meditative stabilization.

original: de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the sarvadharmasamati-vikrīḍita meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags par 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags par 'gro ba ste /
translated: one goes beyond all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the sarvadharmasamati-vikrīḍita meditative stabilization.

original: de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the śikhara-kūṭa-darśana meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug @226b la rnam par lta bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug @226b la rnam par lta bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one sees the peak of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //🔽de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o // de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: This is called the śikhara-kūṭa-darśana meditative stabilization.🔽“What is the dharmadhātu-niyat meditative stabilization?

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'gro ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one goes to the certainty of the dharma-element.

original: de ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the “dharmadhātu-determined” meditative stabilization.

original: de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the ‘dhvaja-ketu’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste /
translated: It is that meditative stabilization standing in which they hold the victory banner of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the ‘dhvaja-ketu’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the ‘vajra-ratna’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed pa ste /
translated: It is that meditative stabilization standing in which they do not break any meditative stabilization.

original: de ni rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the ‘vajra-ratna’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the ‘entry into the seal of all phenomena’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is that meditative stabilization standing in which they

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the entry into the seal of all phenomena.

original: de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization “entry into the seal of all phenomena. ”

original: de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meditative stabilization called “well-established like a king in meditative stabilization”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po'i gnas pa lta bus gnas pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po'i gnas pa lta bus gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which he abides in all meditative stabilizations like a king.

original: de ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization “well-established like a king in meditative stabilization. ”

original: de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: What is the meditative stabilization called “emitting light rays”?

original: @227a *// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste /
analyzed: @227a *// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which he emits light rays of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization “emitting light rays. ”

original: de la dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samadhi called “array of troops”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpung 'god par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpung 'god par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samadhi standing in which he causes the troops of all samadhis to be arrayed.

original: de ni dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is said to be the samadhi called “array of troops.”

original: de la yang dag par 'phags ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag par 'phags ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samadhi called “noble ascent”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa ste /
translated: It is the samadhi standing in which he ascends above all samadhis.

original: de ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is said to be the samadhi called “noble ascent.”

original: de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samadhi called “entry into the teaching of definitions”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the samadhi standing in which he enters into the teaching of the definitions of all samadhis.

original: de ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the samadhi called Entering the Teaching of Definitions.

original: de la tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samadhi called Correct Engagement with Terms?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting de 'dzin thams cad kyi ming dang tshig bla dvags la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting de 'dzin thams cad kyi ming dang tshig bla dvags la 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the samadhi standing in which they engage with the names and terms of all samadhis.

original: de ni tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the samadhi called Correct Engagement with Terms.

original: de la phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samadhi called Looking at the Directions?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs la rnam par lta ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs la rnam par lta ba ste /
translated: It is the samadhi standing in which they look at the directions of all samadhis.

original: de ni phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the samadhi called Looking at the Directions.

original: de la @227b phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la @227b phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samadhi called Holding the Seal?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization that, when one dwells in it, holds the seal of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the meditative stabilization “holding the seal. ”

original: de la brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meditative stabilization called “without expression”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization that, when one dwells in it, does not forget any meditative stabilization.

original: de ni brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the meditative stabilization “without forgetting. ”

original: de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du brgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du brgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meditative stabilization called “seal of the ocean of all dharmas”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'du ba dang / yang dag par gzhol ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'du ba dang / yang dag par gzhol ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization that, when one dwells in it, all meditative stabilizations are gathered and enter into it.

original: de ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the meditative stabilization “seal of the ocean of all dharmas. ”

original: de la nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na; ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na nam mkha' khyab par byed pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad khyab par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na; ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na nam mkha' khyab par byed pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad khyab par byed pa ste /
translated: “What is the ākāśa­spharaṇa meditative stabilization? It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they pervade all meditative stabilizations with the pervasiveness of space.

original: de ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the ākāśa­spharaṇa meditative stabilization.

original: de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: “What is the vajra-maṇḍala meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they hold the maṇḍala of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the vajra-maṇḍala meditative stabilization.

original: de la rin po che'i spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: de la rin po che'i spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: “What is the ratna-cintā meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma thams cad kyang spong na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma thams cad kyang spong na /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they abandon all signs of meditative stabilization.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams @228a *//
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams @228a *//
translated: They abandon all afflictions.

original: kyi mtshan ma dag lta ci smos te /
analyzed: kyi mtshan ma dag lta ci smos te /
translated: What need be said about the signs of the other perfections?

original: de'i phyir rin po che'i spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //🔽de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rin po che'i spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o // de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: Therefore it is called the Ratnārcis meditative stabilization.🔽“What is the Vairocana meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger snang ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger snang ba ste /
translated: all meditative stabilizations shine, glow, and blaze.

original: de'i phyir rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the Vairocana meditative stabilization.

original: de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Asaradvaja meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang mi tshol ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang mi tshol ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one does not seek any dharma.

original: de'i phyir tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the Asaradvaja meditative stabilization.

original: de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Asamāhita meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos 'ga' yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: The meditative stabilization that, when entered, does not see any dharma as based on a location is called

original: de'i phyir gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: the “baseless” meditative stabilization.

original: de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: “What is the ‘no-mind’ meditative stabilization?”🔽The meditative stabilization that, when entered, does not engage mind and mental factor dharmas is called

original: de'i phyir sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: the “no-mind” meditative stabilization.

original: de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste /
translated: “What is the ‘stainless lamp’ meditative stabilization?”🔽The meditative stabilization that, when entered, makes the lamp of all meditative stabilizations stainless is called

original: de'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: the “stainless lamp” meditative stabilization.

original: de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called infinite light?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na 'od mtha' yas pa byed pa @228b ste; de'i phyir 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na 'od mtha' yas pa byed pa @228b ste; de'i phyir 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he manifests infinite light; therefore it is called the samādhi called infinite light.

original: de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called illuminating light?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste de'i phyir 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste de'i phyir 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he illuminates the light of all samādhis; therefore it is called the samādhi called illuminating light.

original: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called universal illumination?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which, as soon as he attains it, the door of all samādhis is illuminated;

original: de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: therefore it is called the samādhi called universal illumination.

original: de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, is the samādhi called pure and sublime?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin gyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid thams cad rjes su thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin gyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid thams cad rjes su thob pa ste /
translated: When you rest in this samādhi you attain the purity and sameness of all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called pure and sublime.

original: de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, is the samādhi called stainless light?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: When you rest in this samādhi you clear away the stains of all samādhis and illuminate all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called stainless light.

original: de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, is the samādhi called creating delight?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa ste /
translated: When you rest in this samādhi you experience the delight of all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called Delightful.

original: de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the vidyuddyotano nāma samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste /🔽de'i phyir glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i @229a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste / de'i phyir glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i @229a *//
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he is a lamp for all samādhis.

original: ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the vidyuddyotano nāma samādhi.

original: de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the akṣayākṣayo nāma samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa dang mi zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa dang mi zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he does not see the exhaustion or non-exhaustion of all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the akṣayākṣayo nāma samādhi.

original: de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the tejorāśi nāma samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis 'bar bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis 'bar bar byed pa ste /
translated: The meditative stabilization standing in which all meditative stabilizations blaze with splendor and glory

original: de'i phyir gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: is called the “splendor” meditative stabilization.

original: de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen /
analyzed: de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen /
translated: Among them, what is the “free from extinction” meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
translated: The meditative stabilization standing in which one does not see the extinction of any meditative stabilization

original: ji ltar chos phra rab kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar chos phra rab kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
translated: and does not see even the most subtle phenomenon,

original: de'i phyir zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: is called the “free from extinction” meditative stabilization.

original: de la mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: Among them, what is the “unmoving” meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: The meditative stabilization standing in which one does not falsely project any meditative stabilization

original: spros par mi byed cing; mi g-yo mi 'gul ba ste /
analyzed: spros par mi byed cing; mi g-yo mi 'gul ba ste /
translated: It does not engage in conceptual elaboration and is without movement or agitation.

original: de'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the immovable meditative stabilization.

original: de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the unchanging meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'gyur ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'gyur ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one does not see any change in any meditative stabilization.

original: de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the unchanging meditative stabilization.

original: de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge @229b 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge @229b 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the sun-lamp meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one illuminates the door of the light rays of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de'i phyir nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the sun-lamp meditative stabilization.

original: de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the stainless moon meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mun pa med par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mun pa med par byed pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which all samādhis are made free from darkness.

original: de'i phyir zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the Vimaladīpa samādhi.

original: de la snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Viśeṣamati samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which all samādhis attain the four analytical knowledges.

original: de'i phyir snang ba dag pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba dag pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the Viśeṣamati samādhi.

original: de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Ālokakara samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which the doors of all samādhis are illuminated.

original: de'i phyir snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the Ālokakara samādhi.

original: de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Kṛtyakṛtya samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba'i rnam pa dag byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba'i rnam pa dag byed pa ste /
translated: When you rest in this meditative absorption, you accomplish the activity of all meditative absorptions.

original: de'i phyir bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the meditative absorption called Accomplishing Activity.

original: de la ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: de la ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: What is the meditative absorption called the Banner of Wisdom?

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes kyi tog yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes kyi tog yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
translated: When you rest in this meditative absorption, you see the banner of wisdom of all meditative absorptions.

original: de ni ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the meditative absorption called the Banner of Wisdom.

original: de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meditative absorption called Vajra-like?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad @230a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad @230a *//
translated: When you rest in this meditative absorption, you realize all phenomena

original: rtogs shing / ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs shing / ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: and do not see even meditative absorption.

original: de ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the meditative absorption called Vajra-like.

original: de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called abiding mind?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na de'i sems mi g-yo mi ldog la /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na de'i sems mi g-yo mi ldog la /
translated: It is the samādhi abiding in which the mind does not move, does not turn back,

original: yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: does not become discouraged,

original: sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la /
translated: and does not become lazy.

original: de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no zhes bya bar yang mi sems pa ste /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no zhes bya bar yang mi sems pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi in which one does not think, ‘This is the mind.’

original: de'i phyir sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called abiding mind.

original: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called universal illumination?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun tu snang ba mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun tu snang ba mthong ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi abiding in which one sees the universal illumination of all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called universal illumination.

original: de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called firm abiding?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi abiding in which one firmly abides in all samādhis.

original: de ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the “well-established” meditative stabilization.

original: de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the ‘jewel-peak’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin po che'i mtha' lta bur kun tu snang ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin po che'i mtha' lta bur kun tu snang ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing on which all meditative stabilizations appear like the peak of a jewel.

original: de'i phyir rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the ‘jewel-peak’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na phyag rgya med pa'i mtha'i rgyas btab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na phyag rgya med pa'i mtha'i rgyas btab pa'i phyir /
translated: “What, you ask, is the ‘sealing with the highest Dharma’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa yin te /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing on which all meditative stabilizations are sealed with the seal of the absence of a seal.

original: @230b de'i phyir chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: @230b de'i phyir chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the ‘sealing with the highest Dharma’ meditative stabilization.

original: de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you ask, is the ‘sameness of all phenomena’ meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing on which

original: mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is to not see any phenomena apart from sameness.

original: de'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the meditative absorption of the sameness of all phenomena.

original: de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative absorption of the abandonment of joy?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative absorption standing in which they abandon the joy of all meditative absorptions and all phenomena.

original: de'i phyir dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the meditative absorption of the abandonment of joy.

original: de la chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative absorption of the exalted and complete Dharma?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad kyis 'phags par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad kyis 'phags par 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is the meditative absorption standing in which they become exalted through all phenomena

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: and complete in all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: de'i phyir chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called ‘noble perfection of phenomena.’

original: de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called scattering?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par 'thor bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par 'thor bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi dwelling in which scatters all phenomena with all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called scattering.

original: de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called differentiating all phenomena?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed par byed pa ste /🔽de'i phyir chos @231a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed par byed pa ste / de'i phyir chos @231a *//
translated: It is the samādhi dwelling in which differentiates all phenomena and all the words of all phenomena.

original: thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called differentiating all phenomena.

original: de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the sameness of syllables meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they attain the sameness of syllables of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the sameness of syllables meditative stabilization.

original: de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the syllable-free meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they do not apprehend even one syllable of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de'i phyir yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the syllable-free meditative stabilization.

original: de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the object-cutting meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs ba gcod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs ba gcod par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which they cut off the objects of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the object-cutting meditative stabilization.

original: de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “unmoving”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which

original: chos thams cad kyi 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: one does not apprehend the movement of any dharma.

original: de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called “unmoving.”🔽What is the samādhi called “without a locus”?🔽It is the samādhi standing in which🔽one does not apprehend a locus for any samādhi.🔽Therefore it is called the samādhi called “without a locus.”

original: de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “without a sign”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: one does not apprehend a sign for any samādhi.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called “without a sign.”

original: de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “without a basis”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: one does not apprehend a basis for any samādhi.

original: de'i phyir gnas med @231b par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas med @231b par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called “without a basis.”

original: de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the vimalaprabha samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par spyod pa ste /
translated: he does not see the cataracts of any samādhi.

original: de'i phyir rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the vimalaprabha samādhi.

original: de la dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the vicāraṇāvat samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: he does not see the investigation of any samādhi.

original: de'i phyir dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the vicāraṇāvat samādhi.

original: de la g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the acala samādhi?🔽It is the samādhi standing in which

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na; ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi g-yo ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na; ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi g-yo ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: he does not see the movement of any samādhi.

original: de'i phyir g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called Unmoving.

original: de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called Transcending Objects?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi dwelling in which

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste /
translated: one transcends the objects of all samādhis.

original: de'i phyir yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called Transcending Objects.

original: de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called Assemblage of All Merits?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the samādhi dwelling in which

original: chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste /
translated: one attains the assemblage of all the merits of all dharmas and all samādhis.

original: de ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the samādhi called Assemblage of All Merits.

original: de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called Abiding in the Absence of Mind?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad @232a *//🔽la sems mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad @232a *// la sems mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which they do not engage the mind in any samādhi.

original: de ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the ‘samādhi standing in which they do not engage the mind in any samādhi.’

original: de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Puṣpamālāvikasitaśubha samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which they obtain the blooming of the flowers of the virtues of all samādhis.

original: de ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the Puṣpamālāvikasitaśubha samādhi.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Bodhyāṅgasamudgata samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi standing in which they obtain the seven factors of awakening.

original: de ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the Bodhyāṅgasamudgata samādhi.🔽“What is the Ālokopasaṃhāra samādhi?

original: de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called infinite eloquence?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they attain infinite eloquence in all the meditative stabilities.

original: de ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is why it is called the samādhi called infinite eloquence.

original: de la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: de la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called equal to the unequaled?

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they attain the unequaled in all the meditative stabilities.

original: de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: That is why it is called the samādhi called equal to the unequaled.

original: de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called passing over all phenomena?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they pass over the whole of the three realms.

original: de ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin @232b ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin @232b ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization Doorway to All Dharmas.

original: de la yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called Complete Destruction?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yongs su gcod pa snang ba ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yongs su gcod pa snang ba ste /
translated: one completely destroys all dharmas and all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization called Complete Destruction.
